courseWork.title: [Act4] Work and Kinetic Energy
courseWork.description:
For your fourth and final activity, you are to solve some problems which will hopefully test your understanding on how work and energy concepts may be utilized to describe the motion of an object. I've also included a few items on Power, so make sure that you've reviewed this section as well. For this activity, you may refer to the lecture slides which were provided for you previously.

INSTRUCTIONS:
As before, you'll have to inform me (through private comment) the time and date that you opened the file in the attachment. From there, you will have a day to complete the activity. Please submit your file with the format SURNAME_Act4.pdf (or .jpg if scanned). The deadline for this is next Thursday on or before 15:00.

Please work on your own. And if you have questions regarding the items in the activity, just send me an email or a private comment.

Good luck!

courseWork.title: [Act3] Newton's Laws of Motion
courseWork.description:
For your third activity, I've prepared a multiple-choice type of test about Newton's laws of motion and its various applications. The equations provided in the questionnaire should be sufficient to solve the given problems. You only have to provide me the letter of your answer for each item (no solutions needed).

INSTRUCTIONS:
Do not open the file if you are not ready to answer or still need to review your notes or the lecture slides. Once you do, you'll have to inform me (through private comment) the time and date that you opened it, and you can no longer refer to your notes. From there, you will have a day to complete the activity. Please submit your file with the format SURNAME_Act3.pdf (or .jpg if scanned). The deadline for this is next Thursday before our class period.

Please work on your own. And if you have questions regarding the items in the activity, just send me an email or a private comment.

Good luck!

Please work on your own. And if you have questions regarding the items in the activity, just send me an email or a private comment.

Good luck!

courseWork.title: [Act2] Projectile Motion
courseWork.description:
In the attachment, you can find the pdf file for your second activity. This is an unsupervised examination, but please make sure that you answer this on your own. You can refer to the lecture slides that I have shared with you before. THIS WILL ALSO SERVE AS YOUR EXAMINATION FOR THE LAB COURSE. This means that you can also use the PhET simulation for projectile motion to guide you in answering the problems.

INSTRUCTIONS:
Do not open the file if you are not ready to answer. Once you do, you'll have to inform me (through private comment) the time and date that you opened it. From there, you will have a day to complete the activity. Please submit your file with the format SURNAME_Act2.pdf (or .jpg if scanned). The deadline for this is next Thursday before our class period.

Good luck!

P.S.Â Collaborating with others is fine (e.g, discussing with your peers when studying together) but copying each other's work is not allowed, as with all of your other courses. Just try to be honest with yourself and believe that you have the capacity to understand.

comments.comment: Good afternoon sir, sorry for not being able to submit my work last week, I was having an extreme fever and just got better today. I will submit it within the day sir, thank you and hoping for your kind consideration

comments.comment: No worries, Refino. Just submit it whenever you can. You don't have to submit both activities today. Don't forget to notify me whenever you've opened and started answering our activity for the lecture course.
